page.title: 15GOOLE - INDIVIDUAL LEISURE
page.content: Many people prefer to follow {individual}interests. These are applicable to any age group, may cost very little and can be pursued either indoors or out. Although individual by nature, many of the activities are pursued within a club or society. The variety of{hobbies}include: music photography, art and crafts,gardening, DIY,bee-keeping,home computing and reading. Some prefer quieter games such as cards and board games like chess, or sports such as jogging or angling. There are many who prefer{passive activities such as playing records or simply watching the television. The most common pastime is some sort of{collecting}activity. The need for leisure is growing as working patterns change.
